thread.title: Ustad Amjad Ali Khan to pay musical tribute to Mahatma Gandhi
thread.title_full: Ustad Amjad Ali Khan to pay musical tribute to Mahatma Gandhi | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Ustad Amjad Ali Khan to pay musical tribute to Mahatma Gandhi
text:
Other Articles 'Talvar' box office collections: Irrfan Khan starrer records 25% occupancy rate on day 1 'Singh Is Bling' box office collections: Akshay Kumar starrer gathers 80% occupancy on day 1 'Girls Next Door' star Bridget Marquardt engaged to beau Nick Carpenter Noted sarod maestro Ustad Amjad Ali Khan to pay musical tribute to Mahatma Gandhi will pay tribute to the Father of the Nation, Mahatma Gandhi on the occasion of his 146th birth anniversary in a D D Bharati organised programme today.
The musical programme is titled Sangeetanjali, and Ustad Amjad Ali Khan will play some beautiful renditions and musical compositions, including Gandhiji’s favourite hymns Vaishnav Jan To Tene Kahiye Je and Ram Dhun.
This musical tribute to India’s Messenger of Peace is yet another step taken by DD Bharati towards reviving Indian culture and keeping the nation’s heritage intact with our roots.
Sangeetanjali will be telecast today at 9 p.m. and a repeat telecast will take place on Saturday.
First Published on October 02, 2015 4:14 pm
